Who is she f*cking to get away with this???? Omfg this is a joke!!! No wonder men don‚Äôt want to come forward about abuse. Even if Johnny lost this case she DID physically abuse him... they‚Äôre going to pull him from movies but not her? DOUBLE STANDARD
